<cs> my lords may i ask the noble lord if he would answer the question put by my noble friend lord john-mackie <e> <s> if there is a refusal by a defence authority to release land which on the face of it looks as if it is readily available for release is there any procedure for those who think it ought to be released to appeal to anybody write to anybody or to bring pressure to bear upon anybody <e>

<cs> we have had one gnomic silence in the course of this debate and i wish that we could have had it broken <e> <s> scotland has managed to apply a law which the noble and learned lord the lord chancellor has now been dismissing in the most fierce terms <e>
